title: Possible sivir bug?
body: Was playing a match today against an enemy sivir and I noticed after a fight had taken place her "spinning blade" or whatever it is seemed to be hovering above the ground and stayed there for a couple minutes. It's probably nothing but just wanted to put it out there just in case...

replies.body: You mean in my items? Or on the map?

it happens every now and then with lots of ranged champs.. on that note, the flying thresh hook is fun, it happens when an ally is attacked but the attack is canceled at the same time the ally flashes

also, your deaths and assist are wrong way around

> also, your deaths and assist are wrong way around

Pretty sure its correct XD, just had a bad game
Yeah, this has been around for quite a while now but it's really one of those 'no harm, no foul' bugs that'll just eventually be fixed when Riot does some work on one thing or another.
